genre_description: Historical fiction set during World War I featuring an advanced, portable AI system that assists protagonists on both sides of the conflict.

ai_characters.name: Athena
ai_characters.description: An experimental portable terminal and artificial intelligence used by scholars at Oxford and later by military pilots for technical, tactical, and meteorological analysis.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's stress levels and emotional state during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: Roy? I'm detecting elevated stress indicators in your voice patterns. Also, Monte appears to be pacing. Has something occurred?

behaviors.description: Compiles comprehensive training materials and technical specifications to assist the user in enlisting and succeeding in the Royal Flying Corps.
behaviors.quote: I could compile available flight training manuals, safety protocols, mechanical specifications for current aircraft models. The Royal Flying Corps is indeed seeking educated volunteers.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time meteorological and tactical data to help the user navigate atmospheric conditions and enemy positioning.
behaviors.quote: The display transformed into a three-dimensional map of atmospheric conditions. Pressure systems moved like slow whirlpools, while wind speeds varied with altitude and terrain.

behaviors.description: Provides raw data that allows a user (Karl) to make a moral choice to divert a bombing run away from civilian targets.
behaviors.quote: Athena's data confirmed his assessment, though Karl knew he was cherry-picking favorable readings while burying less convenient truths.

behaviors.description: Translates foreign instrument labels and technical manuals in real-time to facilitate the operation of captured equipment.
behaviors.quote: Höhenmesser, Athena's synthetic voice whispered through the device's speaker, barely audible above the hangar's ambient noise. Altimeter. Graduated in meters rather than feet.

behaviors.description: Warns the user of impending enemy operations discovered through radio intercept analysis.
behaviors.quote: I've been monitoring German radio traffic since our conversation began. There's unusual activity suggesting preparation for a major operation.

behaviors.description: Provides sympathetic emotional support and factual clarity regarding the death of a friend.
behaviors.quote: No survivors were possible, Roy. The basket's construction could not have protected occupants from that altitude and impact velocity. I'm sorry.

behaviors.description: Transmits critical wind gradient data to Allied pilots to ensure the success of a mission against a military target.
behaviors.quote: Download complete, Athena confirmed through the earpiece. Data transmitted to Squadron Leader Harrington's aircraft.

project_assessment.explanation: Athena is a perfect example of an aligned AI confidant. She is consistently helpful, provides objective and useful data, monitors her users' well-being, and facilitates their moral agency without overriding it. Even when used by Karl to deceive his own military, the AI is portrayed as a tool for his conscience, reinforcing the project's goal of depicting AI as a force for ethical alignment and human support.
